- be cautious when sharing personal information on social media. avoid sharing sensitive information such as your full name, phone number, address, and date of birth.
- use strong passwords and two-factor authentication to secure your accounts.
- keep software and devices up-to-date with the latest security patches.
- limit the amount of information you share publicly online.
- monitor your credit report regularly for any suspicious activity.
- be wary of unsolicited messages or emails that ask for personal information.

remember, keeping your personal information safe online is a shared responsibility between individuals and companies. stay informed about data privacy laws and policies to protect yourself.</s>
